attributes.title: SAD
attributes.review: I was excited to see what this app would give  me and what type of information BUT when I opened it it was trashhhhh it froze my phone so many times randomly people kept calling me after I used it. Right when I finally got it to work a fat scary Cheeto looking thing came upppp I was so scared I couldn’t breath and I almost lost it I had high hopes :(

attributes.title: Terrible app ✨
attributes.review: So I downloaded it was very excited to support this cheeto man☺️💞and get more educated about 🍊🙈✨.i started to get rlly weird because this orange cheeto popped up on my screen i fr was abt to cry i had a panic attack I thought someone was hacking me ?!;) thankfully it was only this app so dont download bc this scary man is weirddd ✨🙈❤️ it pops up randomly also very disturbing news..😡saying my ppl bring crime. Viva mexico 🇲🇽

attributes.title: wEIrD
attributes.review: so let me start out by saying i was ✨uncomfortable✨ opening this app. i was greeted with an fruit ( 🍊 ) and was scared. i thought this was an app to watch mickey mouse doing a collab with james charles, but no!!! 😡😡😡 they tricked me into to thinking something else and this is no acceptable. i’ve never been a karen but this behavior on behalf of this so called “app” is astronomically DISGUSTING 😡😌. please remove asap. sincerely, your ✨mom✨ 💘💘😌😌😌

attributes.title: Disappointment
attributes.review: I was rlly looking forward to using this app but as soon as I opened it the annoying orange started popping up everywhere.. I didn’t think much of it at first but then the annoying orange was all I could see when I close my eyes.. it was rlly weird anyway the game doesn’t even work and then videos keep crashing

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Almost as soon as I downloaded the app there were Beatles coming out of my phone and I had bad luck immediately. My fish that’s been floating at the top of its bowl is dead! What a tragedy! The app kept crashing and the content had no flavor. I had tried to use the recipes to make ramen and it didn’t even make me ramen. I don’t recommend this app.

attributes.title: The App Is Terrible
attributes.review: Right when I opened up the app, my phone randomly turned off which was weird so when I opened up the app again my screen froze for an hour. After an hour I opened up the app and it disabled my phone for 3 hours which really got me mad but I’m writing this review to warn guys not download. It’s a complete waste of time.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is ridiculous it takes up way too much space slow down my phone and I wish I could give it lower than a one star review this is absolute trash and it’s very hard to understand how to use the app definitely not put together well at all and 10/10 will NEVER recommend this app to anybody ever

This app took so long that my father raped more minors in the time it took for this to download and then I got mad and asked him to stop running and he said that if I don’t give him my phone he’s gonna force me to support him even though I hate everything he stands for I absolutely can’t wait till i turn 18 so I can get out of this orange head wig wearing Cheeto smelling mans house

attributes.title: The ratings don’t lie
attributes.review:
This app is kinda pointless. Every time I tried to get an update on his campaign, my phone crashed. Even when I spent enough time for it to finally load for me, the information was outdated by WEEKS. This is unacceptable, and the trump administration still attended to this app better than they responded to the coronavirus. 

#anyonebuttheorange2020

attributes.title: this is poopooo
attributes.review: i was expecting great things when i opened this app but it was just a spray tanned cheeto puff staring at me and telling me to vote for him. he looks like an orange clown. anyways it scared me so much that i had to go to the hospital in me mums car vroom vroom. when i arrived there my doctor turned out to be my ex husband from my past life 🙀 he didn’t recognize me tho. when i got out of the hospital i told my godmother that i wanted to go bungee jumping and she said ok so we went and i ended up dying but it’s ok because this app is bad❤️ so yea don’t download it if you don’t wanna end up like me have a nice day oh an #obama2020 ❤️🙈🙈😺👺🎣🏈✌️🤣✨😂🙃
